channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole in path leading to driveway, 26th August
item.description:
Large pothole on path that leads onto private driveway) behind the green gates of house on corner or pottersfield road and crandord close. causing damage car.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pottersfield Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on roundabout, 26th August
item.description:
2 large St George's flags poorly painted onto each roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: Overgrown hedgerow, 26th August
item.description:
I am writing on behalf of some constituents who live in the park homes along Orchard Park, Green Lane in Hucclecote, who have raised their concerns in relation to overgrowing trees and brambles, as well as rubbish that has been left in the area. One resident in particular is having issues with the overgrowth coming over their fence and causing them issues. I would be grateful if you could pass this onto the relevant team. I have already confirmed with the Highways team that this area does not fall under their remit. The what3words are deal.pine.finds. If you need anything further, please let me know and I look forward to hearing from you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Park, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
